name: Peri Peri African Chicken
author: UKNO1CHEF
summary: This is a great spicy marinade recipe, a traditional African dish, great for BBQ. Nice with salad and fries, but I like adding it to a pita with salad and garlic Greek yogurt (3/4 cup Greek yogurt and 3 cloves of crushed garlic with finely chopped chives). Don't go on a date though, gives you wicked garlic breath!
directions: In a large bowl, stir together the paprika, chili powder, lemon juice, garlic, ginger and salt
Rub chicken with the mixture, place in a dish, and marinate for 3 hours
Preheat a grill for medium heat
Place chicken onto the grill and discard the marinade
Cook for about 30 minutes, turning occasionally, until the skin is slightly charred and juices run clear
